attributes.action: Rates and taxes relief for all UK companies now.
attributes.additional_details: Because UK businesses will collapse. They need the cash flow flexibility to continue trying to keep their staff employed.
attributes.background: A temporary measure to help UK businesses survive the following months, whether it is paying money owed from previous years or paying money for the current months.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/301377

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/

UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/guidance/coronavirus-covid-19-information-for-the-public
